data.name: Nights of Azure 2 - Side story, The Foreigner in a Wonderland of Sweets
data.detailed_description: An additional side story, "The Foreigner in a Wonderland of Sweets", will be added to the game.  The story is triggered after you return to the hotel after speaking to Eleanor about the "Wonderland of Sweets" in Chapter 3.
data.about_the_game: An additional side story, "The Foreigner in a Wonderland of Sweets", will be added to the game.  The story is triggered after you return to the hotel after speaking to Eleanor about the "Wonderland of Sweets" in Chapter 3.
data.short_description: An additional side story, "The Foreigner in a Wonderland of Sweets", will be added to the game. The story is triggered after you return to the hotel after speaking to Eleanor about the "Wonderland of Sweets" in Chapter 3.

fullgame.name: Nights of Azure 2: Bride of the New Moon / よるのないくに２ ～新月の花嫁～

data.supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i5 2.6GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX660 or better,1280x720 (Graphic Memory 2GB or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows® 8.1, Windows® 10 (64bit required)
  • Processor: Core i7 3.4GHz over
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX960 or better, 1920x1080 (Graphic Memory 2GB or better)
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c or above
